thread.title: Twitter Gets In Its Feelings Over Future's "HNDRXX" Album
thread.title_full: Twitter Gets In Its Feelings Over Future's "HNDRXX" Album

author: Cherise Johnson
title: Twitter Gets In Its Feelings Over Future's "HNDRXX" Album
text:
0 
Twitter ‚Äì It‚Äôs not unusual for Future to release two projects within a month at the top of the year however, what makes the Atlanta Super Trapper‚Äôs recent releases so special is that instead of it being the usual mixtape and then album combo, he‚Äôs given fans two albums in the form of Future and HNDRXX . 
Former friend and manager Rocko may or may not have something to do with both projects being released as an album as a result of Rocko Da Don‚Äôs ongoing lawsuit, but that didn‚Äôt slow down any of the hype for the LPs. 
The listeners‚Äô reaction in response to Future has been mostly mixed, while reactions to HNDRXX understandably come coupled with a bit of spirited emotion from the internet. Some fans are dubbing it as Future‚Äôs form of Beyonce‚Äôs LEMONDAE or Drake‚Äôs Take Care because of its heartfelt lyricism. HNDRXX is Future's version of "Take Care" 
‚Äî Chris P. Bacon (@illumiiinatii) February 24, 2017 "HNDRXX is the male version of Lemonade" this is mad funny actually üíÄ pic.twitter.com/va5v2BtR8Y 
‚Äî üåπüåä (@SlickisLife) February 24, 2017 
The FBG General described this album as being what his 2014 release Honest should have been during his interview on Zane Lowe‚Äôs Beats 1 Radio show. He also acknowledged that a particular song on HNDRXX may become a source of controversy. 
‚ÄúIt might get more attention than I want it to get,‚Äù he told Lowe. ‚ÄúIt might get the wrong attention, it might get great attention. Who knows? I just know it‚Äôs a song I feel good about. This is me not holding anything back.‚Äù 
The first cut off HNDRXX , ‚ÄúMy Collective,‚Äù immediately addresses his relationship with lean and his son, saying neither one has to do with the other coinciding with Future‚Äôs goals of being as honest as possible with this record. He also goes on to address his relationship with Ciara , lawsuits, betrayal and falling in love throughout the 17-track album. 
Check out Twitter‚Äôs reaction to Future‚Äôs soulful trap album HNDRXX with tears and gifs below. how FUTURE and HNDRXX got me feeling pic.twitter.com/m8QFFBtRTY
